anyOf.title: Animation Specification
anyOf.description: A single string that specifies which animation there are.

anyOf.title: Animation Specification
anyOf.description: A object specification on how to transition.

bind_to_actor.title: Bind To Actor
bind_to_actor.description: Set to false to have the effect spawned in the world without being bound to an actor (by default an effect is bound to the actor).

effect.description: The name of a particle effect that should be played.
effect.title: Effect

locator.description: The name of a locator on the actor where the effect should be located.
locator.title: Locator

pre_effect_script.description: A molang script that will be run when the particle emitter is initialized.
pre_effect_script.title: Pre Effect Script

commands.description: The event or commands to execute.
commands.title: Commands

anyOf.title: Variable
anyOf.description: Sets the value to a molang variable.

anyOf.title: Event
anyOf.description: An event to be called upon within the executing entity.

animation_length.description: The time in seconds this animation will last.
animation_length.title: Animation Length

loop.description: Whenever this animation should loop once it reaches the end, will only happen if the animation is still active.
loop.title: Loop

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: A timeline specification, property names are timestamps.

anim_time_update.title: Animation Time Update
anim_time_update.description: How does time pass when playing the animation. Defaults to `query.anim_time + query.delta_time` which means advance in seconds.
